targets.query: SELECT mean("MetricValue") FROM "flat_metric_events_CUPS" WHERE ("RackLabel" =~ /^$Rack$/ AND "RemoteAddr" =~ /^$IdracServer$/ AND "MetricId" = 'CPUUsage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "RemoteAddr" fill(null)
show tag values cardinality from "flat_metric_events_CUPS" with key = "RemoteAddr" WHERE ("RackLabel" =~ /^$Rack$/ AND "RemoteAddr" =~ /^$IdracServer$/)
show tag values cardinality from "flat_metric_events_CUPS" with key = "RemoteAddr"
show tag values cardinality from /^flat_metric_events/ with key = "MetricId"  WHERE ("RackLabel" =~ /^$Rack$/ AND "RemoteAddr" =~ /^$IdracServer$/)
SELECT count("MetricValue") FROM /^flat_metric_events_/ WHERE ("RackLabel" =~ /^$Rack$/ AND "RemoteAddr" =~ /^$IdracServer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "MetricId" fill(previous)

SELECT mean("MetricValue") FROM "flat_metric_events_CUPS" WHERE ("Id" = 'CUPS' AND "RackLabel" =~ /^$Rack$/ AND "RemoteAddr" =~ /^$IdracServer$/ AND "MetricId" = 'MemoryUsage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "RemoteAddr" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(last("MetricValue"), 1m)/60 FROM "flat_metric_events_NICStatistics" WHERE ("MetricId" = 'TxBytes' AND "RackLabel" =~ /^$Rack$/ AND "RemoteAddr" =~ /^$IdracServer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ContextID", "RemoteAddr" fill(none)

SELECT derivative(last("MetricValue"), 1m)/60  FROM "flat_metric_events_NICStatistics" WHERE ("MetricId" = 'RxBytes' AND "RackLabel" =~ /^$Rack$/ AND "RemoteAddr" =~ /^$IdracServer$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ContextID", "RemoteAddr" fill(none)
